SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_info (user_id, departments, major, phone, email, max, time, lended_num) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{max,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lendedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departments = #{departments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max = #{max,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lended_num = #{lendedNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, departments, major, phone, email, max, time, lended_num from user_info
